statement.p: Find a basis for the subspace of \mathcal{P}^3 W=\mathrm{span}\ \left\{-6 \, x^{3} + 5 \, x^{2} - 5 \, x + 1 , 5 \, x^{2} + 3 \, x - 3 , 6 \, x^{3} - 29 \, x^{2} - 30 \, x + 24 , -4 \, x^{3} + 6 \, x^{2} + 12 \, x - 8 , -2 \, x^{3} - 2 \, x^{2} + 3 \, x - 1\right\}. Be sure to explain why your result is a basis.
